static void main (String[] args) throws Exception

Detailed Description

Develops a quantization scheme using histogram equalization.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.Quantizer.Quantizer ( Histogram  hist,
int  K 
)

Pass in a high-resolution histogram i.e.

with incr=1, for example

Parameters:
hist 
K number of levels 
00030                                            {
00031         this.min = hist.getMin();
00032         int incr = hist.getIncr();
00033         int[] freq = hist.getHist();
00034         int N = 0; // number of samples
00035         for (int i=0; i < freq.length; ++i){
00036             N += freq[i];
00037         }
00038         double N_per_level = N/(double)K;
00039         
00040         // populate
00041         upperBound = new int[K];
00042         int level_no=0;
00043         int at_this_level = 0;
00044         for (int bin_no=0; bin_no < freq.length; ++bin_no){
00045             if (at_this_level < N_per_level){
00046                 at_this_level += freq[bin_no]; // on to next
00047             } else {
00048                 upperBound[level_no] = min + (bin_no * incr);
00049                 // next level
00050                 ++level_no;
00051                 at_this_level = freq[bin_no];
00052             }
00053         }
00054         for (; level_no < K; ++level_no){
00055             upperBound[level_no] = min + freq.length * incr;
00056         }
00057         System.out.println(this);
00058     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.Quantizer.band ( LatLonGrid  data  ) 

replaces each pixel by the center of its bin 

00076                                            {
00077         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data);
00078         int nrows = result.getNumLat();
00079         int ncols = result.getNumLon();
00080         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00081             int bin_no = getBinNumber(data.getValue(i,j));
00082             int cval = (bin_no < 0)? data.getMissing() : getCenterValue(bin_no);
00083             result.setValue(i,j, cval);
00084         }
00085         return result;
00086     }

int edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.Quantizer.getBinNumber ( int  val  )  

00060                                     {
00061         for (int i=0; i < upperBound.length; ++i){
00062             if (val < upperBound[i]){
00063                 return i;
00064             }
00065         }
00066         return -1;
00067     }

int edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.Quantizer.getCenterValue ( int  bin_no  )  

00069                                          {
00070         int lb = (bin_no > 0)? upperBound[bin_no-1] : this.min;
00071         int ub = upperBound[bin_no];
00072         return (ub+lb)/2;
00073     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.Quantizer.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00099                                                             {
00100         // create output directory
00101         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("quantizer");
00102 
00103         // read input
00104         LatLonGrid conus = SurfaceAlbedo.read(SurfaceAlbedo.CONUS, 100);
00105 
00106         // find histogram in three different ways
00107         Histogram full = HistogramBinSelection.createHighestResolution(conus);
00108         for (int k=4; k < 32; k *= 2){ // 4, 8, 16
00109             Quantizer quant = new Quantizer(full, k);
00110             LatLonGrid banded = quant.band(conus);
00111             KmlWriter.write(banded, outdir, "quant_" + k, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00112             
00113             int incr = (int) Math.round( full.getIncr() * full.getHist().length / (double) k);
00114             Histogram eq = new Histogram(full.getMin(),incr, k);
00115             banded = HistogramBinSelection.band(conus, eq);
00116             KmlWriter.write(banded, outdir, "hist_" + k, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00117         }
00118     }

00091         sb.append("Quantizer levels: ");
00092         for (int i=0; i < upperBound.length; ++i){
00093             sb.append(upperBound[i]);
00094             sb.append(" ");
00095         }
